org.ow2.chameleon.rose.api
Class Machine

java.lang.Object
  org.ow2.chameleon.rose.api.Machine

public final class Machine
extends Object

The meat of RoSe. Once you have created a RoSe machine you can add to InConnection that allows for the import of remote services and OutConnection that allows for the export of local OSGi services. You can also create Instance from the Machine, it's useful to Instantiate component providing ExporterService and ImporterService as well as discovery component.

Author:
barjo
